Entrepreneurship is so hard. The journey is long. It‚Äôs important to cherish the victories along the way.
Some entrepreneurs are so desperate to get funded, that they accept a cheque from anyone who is willing to give on to them, even though there are lots of red flags.
This leads to disaster, and then they blame investors for being greedy and unprofessional.
Why not accept responsibility for your own decisions ?¬† No one forced you to take the cheque¬† !¬† Entrepreneurs are supposed to be mature adults,¬† ¬†right ?
Take your time before accepting funds from anyone - remaining happily single is far better than being stuck in an unhappy marriage. Divorces are painful, expensive and traumatic !

KD is one of the founding members of TuneIn's mobile engineering team and was responsible for laying the groundwork of our largest mobile product (android).  While at TuneIn, KD worked to solve some really hard problems for us that resulted in him realizing there was a lack of quality tools to run tests and track results quickly.KD took those lessons to create a platform that was later used by our TuneIn engineering team to build a beta community and a better product.I highly recommend KD and can't wait to see what he does next.

Application Development Team Lead at Winxnet
November 5, 2012, KD worked with Craig in the same group

I worked with KD for nearly a year, and in that time, he impressed me as a world class Android developer. He has the skill not only to produce excellent functionality from scratch, but to also refactor legacy code into reusable, maintainable components. He has been a major contributor to an app with millions of users; that app is routinely among Google's top downloads for its functionality and usability, in no small part to his efforts.KD is an excellent team player, always willing to ask for and listen to feedback from his peers. He is also great at giving honest, helpful feedback to his teammates in order to help his projects and theirs maintain the highest quality. Even when he is super busy, he manages to find time to help out fellow team members in need. His attention to detail, balanced with the drive to get the job done, makes him an invaluable member of his team and an expert at what he does.

summary: I am entrepreneurial product leader with solid technology background. I am experienced in building global teams & scalable products. I founded two SaaS (Mobile, Web) companies, built teams & products from grounds up. I love solving challenging problems. Marketo acquired my last company (Vessel.io). Currently, I am at Marketo leading Mobile Marketing products.- Being a thought leader, I work closely with customers & internal stakeholders to determine product gaps.- Identify growth as well as partnership opportunities to innovate & execute. Own top to bottom product funnel to drive growth initiatives. - Work with cross-functional team including sales, product marketing & customer success.- Proven ability in managing key partners and customer relationships. Solid customer focus and ability to get things done- Hands on with high paced engineering across multiple locations,- Recruit, manage & motivate teams to deliver completive solution under tight timelines.Specialties: Product Strategy, Leadership, Team Management, Hiring, Product Development, SaaS, Cloud, Personalization, Mobile Engagement, Digital Marketing, Mobile Engagement, Marketing Automation, Startups, AWS., Omni channel marketing.
